name: Mr. Miagui
description:
Do you think you deserve that black belt? Are your ready to PROVE that you can handle the ultimate challenge.
We are not talking about some kids game… This is not waxing cars… This is the ultimate challenge…
Catch the flies… with your chopsticks… After all "Man who catch fly with chopstick accomplish anything."
This is the ultimate test of dexterity, speed and accuracy. Catch the flies, but be careful not to catch any butterflies. For those that need an extra hand, we have prepared a grab bag of items you can use:

Slow down the flies with your spray
Make sure you know where they will be by turning on the light
And use the ultimate spiderweb when you really need the help

The question is not whether you can play the game, or catch SOME flies… The question is: "Are you black belt quality?"
If you say the answer is yes… PROVE IT….
